title: No Hard Feelings
description: Holding a grudge can feel like a form of justice, a way of punishing those who have wronged us. But psychologist Fred Luskin says that more often than not, grudges don't hurt the targets of our anger. Instead, they only hurt us. This week, we explore the lingering effects of long-standing animosities, and how to let them go.If you enjoyed today's conversation, be sure to check out these classic Hidden Brain episodes about apologies and forgiveness:The Power of MercyHealing 2.0: The Power of ApologiesHow to Make Amends
author: Hidden Brain Media
excerpt: Subscribers with streaming access can now enjoy a unique mix of podcasts via the SiriusXM mobile app or online.

Eckhart’s wisdom will help you learn to quiet your mind, separate your ego from your true self, and live fully present.Listen to Eckhart Tolle: Essential TeachingsEach week, physician and economist Dr. Bapu Jena will dig into a fascinating study at the intersection of economics and healthcare.Listen to Freakonomics, M.D.It's Me, Tinx, an extension of what fans already have come to know and love about Tinx, features the advice expert, host, and digital creator discussing her life, offering her take on pop culture and relationships, and giving advice to listeners.Listen to It’s Me, TinxDr. Sanjay Gupta is on a mission to help us approach our new normal mindfully, finding a balance between self-care and productivity, and talking to doctors and researchers about the surprising science behind how we can thrive. And if you do, will you tell it on my podcast?”Listen to Storytime with Seth RogenGood parenting advice is everywhere but hosts Nicole Ryan and Rich Davis aren’t afraid to pull the curtain back and laugh at some of their own parenting fails.Listen to Have Kids, They SaidMusicians take apart their songs, and piece by piece, tell the story of how they were made. Each episode features an artist discussing a song of theirs, breaking down the sounds and ideas that went into the writing and recording.Listen to Song Exploder This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations. html:
Experience Podcasts on SiriusXM

Subscribers with streaming access can enjoy an expertly curated collection of podcasts via the SiriusXM app or online.

Gold Minds with Kevin Hart

Kevin Hart is back with a new look, a new name, and a new season of Gold Minds! After giving flowers to the world’s greatest comedians in Season 1, Kevin’s going even bigger for Season 2 and sitting down with the best minds in entertainment, art, business, and culture. Join Kevin each week as he and his guests share stories and discuss what it takes to navigate their careers to become the gold standard of their industries.

Listen to Gold Minds with Kevin Hart

Gold Minds with Kevin Hart

Kevin Hart is back with a new look, a new name, and a new season of Gold Minds! After giving flowers to the world’s greatest comedians in Season 1, Kevin’s going even bigger for Season 2 and sitting down with the best minds in entertainment, art, business, and culture. Join Kevin each week as he and his guests share stories and discuss what it takes to navigate their careers to become the gold standard of their industries.
Listen to Gold Minds with Kevin Hart

    It's Me, Tinx, an extension of what fans already have come to know and love about Tinx, features the advice expert, host, and digital creator discussing her life, offering her take on pop culture and relationships, and giving advice to listeners.
    Listen to It’s Me, Tinx

      Each week original MTV VJs Mark Goodman, Alan Hunter, and Nina Blackwood will flashback to the most totally righteous decade ever to talk about and give personal insights to the biggest 80s moments.
      Listen to I Want My 80s Podcast

        Huge Fan: Where Stars Talk Sports

        Join pro sports commentator LaChina Robinson each week as she digs deep into some of our biggest personalities’ own fan journeys: how they got hooked, their first live game, biggest triumph, most crushing heartbreak, all in a fun, reflective interview.
        Listen to Huge Fan: Where Stars Talk Sports

          Jeff doesn’t hold back when it comes back to his personal life, and many, many, many issues. From the legal and custody battles, to off-again-on-again new relationships, to arguments with neighbors and staff, Jeff will airs out all of his dirty laundry.
          Listen to Jeff Lewis Has Issues

            They say the '90s are the new '80s and former MTV VJ and '90s fanatic Jim Shearer aims to prove it. UT90's will explore this decade that saw the peak and demise of Generation X.
            Listen to Unboxing the 90s

              A transplant surgeon gets a new heart. A psychiatrist treats debilitating anxiety with magic mushrooms. A medical student rushes to the front lines of a pandemic. On Vital Signs, we bring medicine to life, introducing you to the people behind the scrubs.
              Listen to Vital Signs

                Good parenting advice is everywhere but hosts Nicole Ryan and Rich Davis aren’t afraid to pull the curtain back and laugh at some of their own parenting fails.
                Listen to Have Kids, They Said

                  Hear Marvel's Declassified, Marvel’s Wolverine: La Larga Noche & Marvel’s Wastelanders series first on the SiriusXM app or by subscribing to Marvel Podcasts Unlimited on Apple Podcasts.

                  Each week, Ryan "Agent M" Penagos and Tucker Markus give you exclusive previews of all the new Marvel comics that will be waiting for you in stores, along with a special guest to spotlight their favorite comic book moments in the Marvel Universe!
                  Listen to Marvel's Pull List

                    Hosted by Ryan "Agent M" Penagos, Lorraine Cink, and James Monroe Iglehart, This Week in Marvel has the inside access to all the latest Marvel comics, TV, movies, games, toys, and beyond!
                    Listen to This Week in Marvel

                      On Marvel's Voices, host Angélique Roché holds in-depth conversations with diverse storytellers about their creative processes, collaborations, and professional journeys.
                      Listen to Marvel's Voices

                        Hosted by Ellie Pyle, Angélique Roché, and Judy Stephens, the Women of Marvel assemble to show how people of all backgrounds are making a powerful and positive impact on our stories.
                        Listen to Women of Marvel

                          Marvel's Squirrel Girl: The Unbeatable Radio Show!

                            The History of Marvel Comics: Black Panther

                            Explore the comic book origins of Black Panther via conversations with the creators who have shaped T’Challa’s journey, a celebration of the Afro-Futurism of Wakanda, and the worldwide social impact of the character. Hosted by author Nic Stone.
                            Listen to The History of Marvel Comics: Black Panther

                              Marvel’s Wolverine: La Larga Noche

                              PRESENTADO EN ESPAÑOL
                              Después de una serie de muertes misteriosas en Burns, Alaska, los Agentes Especiales Sally Pierce y Tad Marshall llegan a investigar. Muy pronto se dan cuenta de que hay más de lo que se puede ver.
                              Escucha Marvel’s Wolverine: La Larga Noche

                                An exclusive nonfiction narrative podcast focusing on the rich, dynamic, and evolving history of Marvel Comics—as told through a contemporary lens.
                                Listen to Marvel's Declassified

                                  The ultimate remix of Marvel fandom! Marvel/Method is a SiriusXM exclusive weekly podcast where actor and rapper Method Man interviews celebrity guests about life and all things fandom, Marvel comics, music and more.
                                  Listen to Marvel/Method

                                    Marvel's Wolverine: The Long Night

                                    Marvel's first scripted podcast comes to SiriusXM. Following a string of mysterious deaths in Burns, Alaska, Special Agents Sally Pierce and Tad Marshall arrive to investigate. They soon find there's more going on than meets the eye.
                                    Listen to Marvel's Wolverine: The Long Night

                                      Current and classic episodes, featuring compelling true-crime mysteries, powerful documentaries and in-depth investigations.
                                      Listen to Dateline NBC

                                        My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark

                                          For years, some law enforcement agencies have replaced the faces of traditional playing card decks with images of missing and murdered people and distributed those cards in prisons hoping inmates would come forward with information needed to crack these cold cases wide open. Now, audiochuck is dealing you in.
                                          Listen to The Deck

                                            Criminal is the first of its kind. A show about people who’ve done wrong, been wronged, or gotten caught somewhere in the middle. Hosted by Phoebe Judge.
                                            Listen to Criminal

                                              Serial is a podcast from Serial Productions, a New York Times company, hosted by Sarah Koenig. Serial unfolds one story—a true story—over the course of a whole season. Each week she'll bring you the latest chapter, so it's important to listen in.
                                              Listen to Serial

                                                Dr. Death Season 2: Dr. Fata

                                                If someone you love is diagnosed with cancer you want them to get the best treatment from the best doctors. In 2013, patients in Michigan thought Farid Fata was that doctor. But he was not who he appeared to be.
                                                Listen to Dr. Death Season 2: Dr. Fata

                                                  You can't spell lifestyle without lies. When the charges against Newport Beach orthopedic surgeon and former Bravo reality star Dr. Grant Robicheaux and his girlfriend, substitute teacher Cerissa Riley, were revealed in September of 2018, the world gawked.
                                                  Listen to O.C. Swingers

                                                    The disappearance of two of Lori Vallow’s children in Rexburg, Idaho in September 2019 would expose a bizarre trail of death, devotion and Doomsday beliefs that captivated the nation… A haunting podcast from Keith Morrison and Dateline NBC.
                                                    Listen to Mommy Doomsday

                                                      In order to tell the story of a crime, you have to turn back time. Every season, Investigative journalist Delia D'Ambra digs deep into a mind-bending mystery with the hopes of reigniting interest in a decades old homicide case.
                                                      Listen to CounterClock

                                                        The Megyn Kelly Show is your home for open, honest, and provocative conversation with the most interesting and important political, legal and cultural figures today. No B.S. No agenda. And no fear.
                                                        Listen to The Megyn Kelly Show

                                                          Spirited discussions of government, politics, and current events without predictable left/right bias. The Smerconish Podcast is for Independent Minds.
                                                          Listen to The Smerconish Podcast

                                                            "Raised during Reagan, suffered through Clinton" - Andrew Wilkow provides perfectly executed political analysis and unmistakable opinions in "one thing and one thing only...and that is rational thought."
                                                            Listen to The Wilkow Majority

                                                              The Karen Hunter Show teaches the keys to entrepreneurial success in the industries of sports, politics, entertainment and so much more, directly from the celebrities and civilians who have personally created brands from the ground up.
                                                              Listen to The Karen Hunter Show

                                                                The writers and editors of Rolling Stone take you inside the biggest stories in music. Featuring interviews with our favorite artists; what's playing in the office; expert insight on the week's biggest music news; and much more.
                                                                Listen to Rolling Stone Music Now

                                                                  What do female rock stars, label execs, music writers, record store owners and fans have in common? They're all FIERCE: WOMEN IN MUSIC! Music journalist and author Lori Majewski sits down with A-list guests and major movers and shakers.
                                                                  Listen to Fierce Women in Music

                                                                    Dennis Elsas & Bill Flanagan want to talk Beatles with you! With celebrity interviews, listener calls and more.
                                                                    Listen to Fab Fourum

                                                                      Each week original MTV VJs Mark Goodman, Alan Hunter, and Nina Blackwood will flashback to the most totally righteous decade ever to talk about and give personal insights to the biggest 80s moments.
                                                                      Listen to I Want My 80s Podcast

                                                                        Bruce Springsteen, From My Home to Yours

                                                                        Bruce Springsteen takes over his own channel, E Street Radio, to play songs and share thoughts about the times we are living in. Hear Bruce select songs from Roy Orbison, Sam Cook, Don Henley, Lucinda Williams, Bob Dylan, Patti Scialfa, and more.
                                                                        Listen to Bruce Springsteen, From My Home to Yours

                                                                          The Office co-stars and best friends, Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey, are doing the ultimate re-watch podcast for you. Each week Jenna and Angela will break down an episode of The Office and give exclusive behind the scene stories.
                                                                          Listen to Office Ladies

                                                                            Gold Minds with Kevin Hart

                                                                            Kevin Hart is back with a new look, a new name, and a new season of Gold Minds! After giving flowers to the world’s greatest comedians in Season 1, Kevin’s going even bigger for Season 2 and sitting down with the best minds in entertainment, art, business, and culture. Join Kevin each week as he and his guests share stories and discuss what it takes to navigate their careers to become the gold standard of their industries.
                                                                            Listen to Gold Minds with Kevin Hart

                                                                              The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson and Robert Kelly

                                                                              Big Jay Oakerson and Robert Kelly invite listeners and friends to come and hang out by The Bonfire as the blunt and candid duo talk about everything from comedy and entertainment to sports.
                                                                              Listen to The Bonfire

                                                                                The Daily Show: Ears Edition

                                                                                Listen to highlights and extended interviews in the "Ears Edition" of The Daily Show. From Comedy Central’s Podcast Network.
                                                                                Listen to The Daily Show: Ears Edition

                                                                                  Conan O'Brien Needs a Friend

                                                                                  Deeper, unboundedly playful, and free from FCC regulations, Conan O’Brien Needs a Friend is a weekly opportunity for Conan to hang out with the people he enjoys most and perhaps find some real friendship along the way.
                                                                                  Listen to Conan O'Brien Needs a Friend

                                                                                    Marc Maron welcomes comedians, actors, directors, writers, authors, musicians and folks from all walks of life to his home for amazingly revealing conversations. Marc's probing, comprehensive interview style allows guests to express themselves.
                                                                                    Listen to WTF with Marc Maron

                                                                                      Join Dave LaGreca and his rotating co-host chair that features two WWE Hall of Famers in Bully Ray and Mark Henry, Nic Nemeth, AEW Superstar Thunder Rosa, and ECW Legend Tommy Dreamer for the best pro wrestling talk on radio. From the WWE to AEW to the independent scene and beyond, Busted Open covers pro-wrestling like no one else in the world!Listen to Busted Open

                                                                                        I Am Athlete podcast is candid, unscripted weekly discussion between former NFL greats: Brandon Marshall, Chad Johnson, Fred Taylor and Channing Crowder. These gridiron giants pull no punches and have no filter on what they cover.
                                                                                        Listen to I Am Athlete

                                                                                          Let's Go with Tom Brady, Larry Fitzgerald, and Jim Gray

                                                                                          Bill Belichick, Maxx Crosby, and Peter King join Jim Gray for Season Four of Let’s Go! Enjoy in-depth, insightful, and introspective conversations about the NFL from every angle. They'll discuss the top stories on and off the football field, talk to the biggest stars across sports and entertainment, and share stories from their careers and personal lives.
                                                                                          Listen to Let's Go

                                                                                            Wake up to the best sports story you'll hear all day. Monday through Friday, host Pablo Torre brings you an inside look at the most interesting stories at ESPN, as told by the top reporters and insiders on the planet.
                                                                                            Listen to ESPN Daily

                                                                                              From their Oceanside studios at the Clevelander Hotel in Miami Beach, Dan Le Batard, Stugotz and company share their unique perspectives on all-things sports, pop-culture and more.
                                                                                              Listen to The Dan Le Batard Show with Stugotz

                                                                                                30 for 30 offers captivating storytelling for sports fans and general interest listeners alike, going beyond the field to explore how sports, competition, athleticism and adventure affect our lives and our world.
                                                                                                Listen to 30 For 30 Podcasts

                                                                                                  Hosted by museum president and historian Bob Kendrick, the podcast will showcase the history of the Negro Leagues, highlighting the players, people and events that shaped them, as well as spotlighting the leagues’ achievements and innovations.
                                                                                                  Listen to Black Diamonds

                                                                                                    Eckhart Tolle: Essential Teachings

                                                                                                    Oprah Winfrey is thrilled to introduce a weekly podcast series from one of the great spiritual thinkers of our time: Eckhart Tolle. Eckhart’s wisdom will help you learn to quiet your mind, separate your ego from your true self, and live fully present.Listen to Eckhart Tolle: Essential Teachings

                                                                                                      Each week, physician and economist Dr. Bapu Jena will dig into a fascinating study at the intersection of economics and healthcare.Listen to Freakonomics, M.D.

                                                                                                        It's Me, Tinx, an extension of what fans already have come to know and love about Tinx, features the advice expert, host, and digital creator discussing her life, offering her take on pop culture and relationships, and giving advice to listeners.
                                                                                                        Listen to It’s Me, Tinx

                                                                                                          Dr. Sanjay Gupta is on a mission to help us approach our new normal mindfully, finding a balance between self-care and productivity, and talking to doctors and researchers about the surprising science behind how we can thrive. It’s time to chase life.
                                                                                                          Listen to Chasing Life

                                                                                                            Best Friends with Nicole Byer and Sasheer Zamata

                                                                                                            Enter the pantheon of best friendship. When you’re forced to change your number, are sick of being single, or want to take a pole-dancing class, you’re going to need a best friend...and if you don’t, you can still have this podcast.
                                                                                                            Listen to Best Friends with Nicole Byer and Sasheer Zamata

                                                                                                              Every Wednesday, it’s like having happy hour with your best friends, the iconic duo Nikki & Brie, as they take you into their lives beyond the cameras and keep it 100 about being moms, sisters, entrepreneurs, and TV personalities.
                                                                                                              Listen to The Nikki & Brie Show

                                                                                                                True horror fan Dan Cummins attempts to terrify his wife Lynze with two new alleged-to-be-true tales each week.
                                                                                                                Listen to Scared To Death

                                                                                                                  Dave Holmes is obsessed: What ever happened to Sudden Impact, the R&B boy band whose arrival was announced in Boyz II Men’s “MotownPhilly” video? What happens when you make a big debut, and then…nothing happens?
                                                                                                                  Listen to Waiting for Impact

                                                                                                                    Jeff doesn’t hold back when it comes back to his personal life, and many, many, many issues. From the legal and custody battles, to off-again-on-again new relationships, to arguments with neighbors and staff, Jeff will airs out all of his dirty laundry.
                                                                                                                    Listen to Jeff Lewis Has Issues

                                                                                                                      Get obsessed with us. Five days a week, Pop Culture Happy Hour serves you recommendations and commentary on the buzziest movies, TV, music, books, videogames and more.
                                                                                                                      Listen to Pop Culture Happy Hour

                                                                                                                        The SonRise Project is dedicated to helping sons and daughters lead mentally healthy lives while providing a safe space to share and support families dealing with mental illness and addiction issues across the country.
                                                                                                                        Listen to The SonRise Project

                                                                                                                          Storytime with Seth Rogen

                                                                                                                          Hi! Welcome to Storytime with Seth Rogen, where every week Seth asks somebody, “Do you have a great story? And if you do, will you tell it on my podcast?”
                                                                                                                          Listen to Storytime with Seth Rogen

                                                                                                                            Good parenting advice is everywhere but hosts Nicole Ryan and Rich Davis aren’t afraid to pull the curtain back and laugh at some of their own parenting fails.
                                                                                                                            Listen to Have Kids, They Said

                                                                                                                              Musicians take apart their songs, and piece by piece, tell the story of how they were made. Each episode features an artist discussing a song of theirs, breaking down the sounds and ideas that went into the writing and recording.
                                                                                                                              Listen to Song Exploder

                                                                                                                                This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations. Another 2.5 million people download the weekly podcast.
                                                                                                                                Listen to This American Life

                                                                                                                                  Marc Maron welcomes comedians, actors, directors, writers, authors, musicians and folks from all walks of life to his home for amazingly revealing conversations. Marc's probing, comprehensive interview style allows guests to express themselves.
                                                                                                                                  Listen to WTF with Marc Maron

                                                                                                                                    My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark

                                                                                                                                      Listen to Pod Save America

                                                                                                                                        Conan O'Brien Needs a Friend

                                                                                                                                        Deeper, unboundedly playful, and free from FCC regulations, Conan O’Brien Needs a Friend is a weekly opportunity for Conan to hang out with the people he enjoys most and perhaps find some real friendship along the way.
